title: Scimitar of Flaming Death
data:
{{obsolete}} {{flavour|A scimitar with a mysteriously smoking blade. Occasionally its heat leaks out, covering opponents in magical flame.}} [[File:Scimitar_of_flaming_death.png]] '''''the +6 scimitar of Flaming Death'''''
+6 [[scimitar]] [[Flaming]] brand
Occasionally inflicts [[Sticky Flame]] on targets.
rF++
rC-
rPois
MR+ ==Desirability== The big brother of the [[Dagger of Chilly Death]], this weapon is quite decent in the early- to mid-game if you manage to find it. It's especially useful in the [[Lair]], since it kills [[hydra]]s with ease, protects against the numerous sources of poison, and protects you from the one ranged threat there, [[fire drake]]s. In the late game you may wish to switch to something more powerful, particularly if you don't have a way to overcome the rank of [[cold]] vulnerability, but its solid defensive traits, decent damage output, occasionally useful brand, and damage-and-accuracy boosting [[Sticky Flame]] effect can be quite effective in most situations. ==History== *This unrand artifact was removed in [[0.20]]. *Prior to [[0.15]], this weapon's enchantment level was +7, +5. It didn't inflict sticky flame. *Prior to [[0.14]], it only provided +20 MR. [[Category:Unrands]] [[Category:Long blades]]
